009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015/**
016 * <p>
017 * This ImageJ plugin performs linear histogram equalization on the
018 * selected grayscale image, which is modified.
019 * See Sec. 3.5 (Prog. 3.2) of [1] for additional details.
020 * </p>
021 * <p>
022 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>,
023 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
024 * </p>
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 */
028public class Equalize_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
029
030        @Override
031        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
032                return DOES_8G;
033        }
034    
035        @Override
036        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
037                int M = ip.getWidth();
038                int N = ip.getHeight();
039                int K = 256; // number of intensity values
040
041                // compute the cumulative histogram H:
042                int[] H = ip.getHistogram();
043                for (int j = 1; j < H.length; j++) {
044                        H[j] = H[j - 1] + H[j];
045                }
046
047                // equalize the image:
048                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
049                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
050                                int a = ip.get(u, v);
051                                int b = H[a] * (K - 1) / (M * N);
052                                ip.set(u, v, b);
053                        }
054                }
055        }
056        
057}
